info.name: Thamires Helaysa dos Santos
info.summary: I'm a Front-end Engineer with specialization in design, working with React and TypeScript. I learned to code in high school as part of an extension course and improved my skills independently in every company I worked for. I have completed a postgraduate degree in UX Engineering to deepen and combine my design and coding proficiency. Now I have been dedicated to creating clean, accessible and consistent interfaces with solid design principles.

experience.description: As a designer and developer, I led the redesign of the company's website (UX and UI in Adobe XD and Figma) and developed it in Next.js, in alignment with the new brand identity. Co-created the company's component library (React and TypeScript), which is now adopted in over 20 web applications.

Maintained and customized Magento 2 themes using PHTML, XML, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript (jQuery). Served as a technical reference for the team. Responsible for maintaining and discussing better solutions for Magento 2 with the team.
Performed maintenance on themes in HTML and CSS, and jQuery. Maintained and evolved the component library using Vue.js, was responsible for conception and documentation of new projects.
